Subject: Atom entries for change events of resources (looking for appropriate link relation)
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=498432483; y=W2QoOM6FGmozMMtx16AlUqCIFqehYXNFCpfvV8ig80ximij4m0SfiJMC
X-Yahoo-Profile: algermissen1971

Hi,

Suppose I have a set of resources for which changes can be tracked in =
an Atom feed. In such a feed every Atom entry would represent a single chan=
ge event to a specific resource in the set.

For the sake of simplicity of =
the example below, suppose that the entry only notifies about the change as=
 such. Of course, one could include a diff and/or the kind of event in the =
entry, too (e.g. new/update/delete).

What I am looking for is a link relat=
ion that is a good fit for linking from the entry to the changed resources.=
 I am thinking

- about:  <link rel=3D"about" href=3D"/employees/7628827272=
"/>
- via: <link rel=3D"via" href=3D"/employees/7628827272"/>

Mint one:
- =
observed: <link rel=3D"observed" href=3D"/employees/7628827272"/>
- pertain=
s: <link rel=3D"pertains" href=3D"/employees/7628827272"/>
- concerns: <lin=
k rel=3D"concerns" href=3D"/employees/7628827272"/>
